select
from tb_user
AND F_UserName = #{F_UserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND F_Deleted = 1

select
from tb_user
AND F_Mobile = #{F_Mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND F_Deleted = 1

select
from tb_user
AND F_Email = #{F_Email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND F_Deleted = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_user (F_USER_ID, F_UserName,F_Sex,F_Mobile,F_Email, F_Password, F_Deleted,F_RealPassword,F_Ip) values (#{F_USER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{F_UserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{F_Sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{F_Mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{F_Email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{F_Password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{F_Deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{F_RealPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{F_Ip,jdbcType=CHAR})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.select: select F_USER_ID, F_UserName, F_Birthday, F_NickName, F_Sex, F_Hometown, F_Email, F_Mobile, F_RealName, F_QQ from TB_USER where TB_USER.F_USER_ID = #{F_USER_ID} AND F_Deleted = 1
mapper.update: update TB_USER set F_UserName = #{F_UserName}, F_Birthday = #{F_Birthday}, F_NickName = #{F_NickName}, F_Sex = #{F_Sex}, F_Hometown = #{F_Hometown}, F_Email = #{F_Email}, F_Mobile = #{F_Mobile}, F_RealName = #{F_RealName}, F_QQ = #{F_QQ} where F_USER_ID = #{F_USER_ID}
